product.name: BGment Navy Blue 100% Blackout Curtains for Bedroom, 78 Inch Black Out Living Room Panels with Thermal Liner, Rod Pocket and Back Tab Double Layer Room Darkening Drapes, 2 Panels, Each 52 x 78 Inch
product.description:
Is this really blackout 100%?
Yes, these curtains are 100% blackout curtains, block out sunlight completely.
How many pieces in a package?
Yes, 2PCS in a package.
How can I get the right size?
Hi, the length and width of each curtain is measured when fully unfolded, you need to measure the window in advance, we recommend that the width of the curtain should be 1.5-2 times the width of the window.
Why is the color of the curtains I received a little different from when I browsed?
Hi, there is a slight difference in the color of the curtains due to different display devices or lighting problems.
product.bullet_points:
• Do total blackout curtains really make a difference? Sure. BGment blackout curtains for bedroom are made of 2 layers triple weave shading fabric. With thick black lining sewn on the back, offer a completely light blocking effect even in the midday. These Heavy duty window curtains also ensure your privacy and protect your furniture from being damaged by exposing to the sunlight.
• 100% Blackout means real blackout: The blackout double layer curtains darken your room to create a no light space for quality sleep and not disturbed by the early morning sunshine. A must have for night shifts, babies and whom are sensitive to the light but need a better sleep in the day. These block out curtains keeps the bright glare off from your TV, good for media room, living room, office and gaming room.
• How thermal curtains balance room temperature? Our thermal lined curtains insulating heat or wind from outside to keep your indoor retain cool in summer and warm in winter. These room curtains reduce the AC losing out to save your energy cost. These blackout lined curtains fully covered your window and absorb sound 2 times than normal 1 layer curtains, offer you a more quite environment to rest.
• A variety of hanging methods and experiences：These smooth soft curtain drapes are specially designed for your stylish and elegant home with 3 different hanging methods, which can easily create the visual effect. Help you spending less money to decorate in more flexible styles. Get your money worth.
• Tips: 2 curtain panels included in one order, each panel measures 52 inch wide and 78 inch long, total width is 104 inch. With 3 inch pocket on the header and 7 back tabs. Please measure your window width and height in advance to achieve the desired decorative and functional effect.
